In England, in the seven days to 15 April, there were 14,502 new confirmed cases (25.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 08 April, there were 15,973 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 9% (1,471 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 20 April is 3,839,002 (6,820.4 cases per 100,000 population).
